metadata.name: PUA - Rclone Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of RClone utility for exfiltration as used by various ransomwares strains like REvil, Conti, FiveHands, etc

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--config ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--no-check-certificate ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' copy ')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rclone.exe')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('rsync for cloud storage') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('user')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sync')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('config')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lsd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('remote')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ls')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mega')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pcloud')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ftp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ignore-existing')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('auto-confirm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('transfers')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('multi-thread-streams')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('no-check-certificate ')))))

output.summary: Detects execution of RClone utility for exfiltration as used by various ransomwares strains like REvil, Conti, FiveHands, etc

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line, Details False positive: Unknown References: https://research.nccgroup.com/2021/05/27/detecting-rclone-an-effective-tool-for-exfiltration/, https://thedfirreport.com/2021/03/29/sodinokibi-aka-revil-ransomware, https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ncas/analysis-reports/ar21-126a, https://labs.sentinelone.com/egregor-raas-continues-the-chaos-with-cobalt-strike-and-rclone, https://www.splunk.com/en_us/blog/security/darkside-ransomware-splunk-threat-update-and-detections.html
